meanings.definition: Used to express disgust, frustration, or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: Ugh! I can't believe I forgot my lunch again.
meanings.sent2: She sighed, 'Ugh, this traffic is unbearable.'
meanings.sent3: Ugh, why does broccoli have to taste so bad?
meanings.sent4: The smell of the garbage made her exclaim, 'Ugh, it's like a dumpster in here.'
meanings.sent5: The slimy texture of the food made him mutter, 'Ugh, this is gross.'

meanings.definition: An exclamation of displeasure or discomfort.
meanings.sent1: Ugh! I stubbed my toe on the table.
meanings.sent2: The cold wind made her shiver and say, 'Ugh, it's freezing.'
meanings.sent3: Ugh, why does it always rain on my day off?
meanings.sent4: The muddy puddle made her cry out, 'Ugh, my shoes are ruined.'
meanings.sent5: The taste of the medicine made her exclaim, 'Ugh, this is awful.'
